job.name: Wait_For_Signals_Reactive
job.description: A template workflow that sends a ready notification for all specified signals in the 'SIGNALS' variable, then waits until one signal among those specified is received. This workflow contains no loop. It performs a blocking wait, then immediately triggers some processing at a signal reception.
